member.name: T:simpleOCaml.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Une classe de ressource fortement typée destinée, entre autres, à la consultation des chaînes localisées.

member.name: P:simpleOCaml.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:simpleOCaml.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.

member.name: M:simpleOCaml.LineNumbers_For_RichTextBox.Update_SizeAndPosition
member.summary: This Sub will run whenever Me.Refresh() is called. It applies the AutoSizing and DockSide settings.

member.name: M:simpleOCaml.LineNumbers_For_RichTextBox.Update_VisibleLineNumberItems
member.summary: This Sub determines which textlines are visible in the ParentRichTextBox, and makes LineNumberItems (LineNumber + ItemRectangle) for each visible line. They are put into the zLNIs List that will be used by the OnPaint event to draw the LineNumberItems.

member.name: M:simpleOCaml.LineNumbers_For_RichTextBox.FindStartIndex(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: FindStartIndex is a recursive Sub (one that calls itself) to compute the first visible line that should have a LineNumber.
member.param: this will hold the eventual BestStartIndex when the Sub has completed its run.

member.name: M:simpleOCaml.LineNumbers_For_RichTextBox.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: OnPaint will go through the enabled elements (vertical ReminderMessage, GridLines, LineNumbers, BorderLines, MarginLines) and will draw them if enabled. At the same time, it will build GraphicsPaths for each of those elements (that are enabled), which will be used in SeeThroughMode (if it's active): the figures in the GraphicsPaths will form a customized outline for the control by setting them as the Region of the LineNumber control. Note: the vertical ReminderMessages are only drawn during designtime.
